Tab 1 content

Tab 2 content

Tab 3 content


    
<div class="clearfix">
  <ul class="nav nav-pills" role="tablist">
    <li class="nav-item">
      <a href="#tab1" class="nav-link active" role="tab" data-toggle="tab">Active</a>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item">
      <a href="#tab2" class="nav-link" role="tab" data-toggle="tab">Link</a>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item">
      <a href="#tab3" class="nav-link" role="tab" data-toggle="tab">Another Link</a>
    </li>
    <li class="nav-item">
      <span class="nav-link disabled" role="tab">Disabled</a>
    </li>
  </ul>
</div>
<div class="tab-content">
  <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane active" id="tab1"><p>Tab 1 content</p></div>
  <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane" id="tab2"><p>Tab 2 content</p></div>
  <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane" id="tab3"><p>Tab 3 content</p></div>
</div>

<div class="row">
  <div class="col-md-4">
    <ul class="nav nav-pills nav-stacked" role="tablist">
      <li class="nav-item">
        <a href="#tab1a" class="nav-link active" role="tab" data-toggle="tab">Active</a>
      </li>
      <li class="nav-item">
        <a href="#tab2a" class="nav-link" role="tab" data-toggle="tab">Link</a>
      </li>
      <li class="nav-item">
        <a href="#tab3a" class="nav-link" role="tab" data-toggle="tab">Another Link</a>
      </li>
      <li class="nav-item">
        <span class="nav-link disabled" role="tab">Disabled</a>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
  <div class="tab-content col-md-8">
    <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane active" id="tab1a"><p>Tab 1 content</p></div>
    <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane" id="tab2a"><p>Tab 2 content</p></div>
    <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane" id="tab3a"><p>Tab 3 content</p></div>
  </div>
</div>
